io.neba.api.annotations

Annotation Type Path


  • @Documented
@Target(value={FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Path
    Defines the relative or absolute path of a property or resource mapped to a field. Can be used when the name of the field does not match the name of the mapped child resource or property, e.g. in case namespaces are used, or if an absolute or relative path is to be mapped.
    Example 

     public class Model {
     @Path("jcr:title")
     private String title;
     @Path("/content/homepage")
     private Page homepage;
     @Path("../toolbar")
     private Page toolbar;
 }

    Author:
    Olaf Otto

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String value

      • value

        public abstract String value
